data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azorsa, F., Sosa-Calvo, J. (2008): Description of a remarkable new species of ant in the genus Daceton Perty (Formicidae: Dacetini) from South America. Zootaxa 1749: 27-38, URL: http://hol.osu.edu/reference-full.html?id=21510
